NAME.Short: Clean Monday: Beginning of Great Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in Tone 5

SEXTE.TROPARION: O Lord, O Lord, at the presence of Whose power all things do fear and tremble: we fall down before Thee, O Immortal One; we pray to Thee O Holy One: Save our souls, through the intercessions of Thy saints.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in Tone 4

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: The Lord knoweth the way of the righteous,
and the way of the ungodly shall perish.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Blessed is the man that hath not walked in the counsel of the ungodly, nor stood in the way of sinners.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in Tone 7

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Serve ye the lord with fear,
SEXTE.STICHOS: Why have the heathen raged, and the peoples meditated empty things?
